description: Verify Tauri app builds and runs successfully
steps: Run pnpm install to install dependencies
Run pnpm dev to start development server
Verify window opens with AgentKanban title

description: SQLite database initializes correctly on app start
steps: Start the app with pnpm dev
Check that database file is created in app data directory
Verify tables are created (events, features, sessions, config)

description: HTTP server accepts and stores events from hooks
steps: POST a test event to http://127.0.0.1:4000/events

description: Kanban board displays features in correct columns
steps: Verify To Do column shows passes:false, inProgress:false
Verify In Progress column shows inProgress:true
Verify events appear in timeline immediately

description: Stats bar shows accurate progress metrics

steps: Click tray icon to show/hide window

description: Desktop notifications work for feature completion

steps: Trigger Scan Projects from tray menu

description: Claude plugin installs and hooks work
Different projects have their own separate kanban boards
steps: Add project selector dropdown in the UI header
Filter kanban board to show only selected project's features

description: Tool calls are linked to active feature in Activity History
steps: Verify ToolCall events include correct featureId
Verify Activity History shows linked tool calls

description: Enhanced tool call and feature details display
Fix empty events and improve activity card display
steps: Show feature description instead of path:index
Only create features for constructive tools (Edit, Write, Task)

description: Support unlinked activities and session-based observability
steps: Add UI section for unlinked/session activities
Filter activity history by feature work period
Allow viewing all session events regardless of feature
Verify changes in session-end.sh work correctly
